name: Trap
description: Originated in Atlanta in the early 2000s; distinctive fast hi-hat sound and heavy bass at moderate tempos.

children.name: Chicago Drill
children.description: Bass-heavy, dense, and typically syncopated percussion, featuring ticking hi-hats and gunshot-like snare rolls, usually accompanied by menacing synth melodies and violent Gangsta Rap lyricism.

children.name: Free Car Music
children.description: Chaotic and metallic percussion with clanging rides, rapid hi hat rolls, and tense kick buildups typically coupled with staggered, punched-in rapping.

children.name: New Jazz
children.description: Colorful, repetitive synths and synthetic instruments, playful vocal chops, and wonky bass selections set to bouncy Trap drums.

children.name: No Melody
children.description: Usage of minimalistic, repetitive midtempo drum patterns, and simple, prominent 808s.

children.name: Plugg
children.description: Use of sparse and compact drum and hi-hat patterns, subby 808s and heavy low end; commonly features piano samples, airy pads, and icy synths.

children.name: Rage
children.description: Dense, buzzing synth work with repetitive chord progressions and melodic synth leads.

children.name: Rare Phonk
children.description: Primarily features eclectic sampling and lush, jazzy beats, usually set to Trap rhythms with prominent influences of Memphis Rap.

children.name: Regalia
children.description: Lush, sweeping string arrangements, dreamy piano passages, and other orchestral instrumentation set to cinematic Trap percussion.

children.name: Trap Metal
children.description: Loud, distorted 808s and basslines, as well as aggressive vocals that are usually yelled or screamed.

children.name: Trap Soul
children.description: Mixes passionate vocals derived from Contemporary R&B with laid-back, nocturnal and atmospheric Trap production.

children.name: Trap latino
children.description: Distinguished by its Reggaet√≥n and Latin Rap roots, with smooth and moody production inspired by Alternative R&B and Contemporary R&B.

children.name: Tread
children.description: Icy or futuristic synths with busy and high-tempo drum programming using distinctive 808 patterns.
